feed.title: Category: Cinnamon | Dark Matter in Cyberspace

entry.title: Mint Cinnamon Note
entry.content:
Verified version: 15.

  • Define keyboard shortcuts: Menu -> System Tools -> System Settings -> Hardware [Switch to Advanced Mode] -> Keyboard -> Keyboard shortcuts;

  • The web browser firefox of this version support Baidu’s netdisk out-of-box without installing flash plugins manually;

Frequently Used Shortcuts

  • Open a terminal: C-M-t;
